label: 鎌足
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: d. 669 at first called Nakatomi Kamatari. Founder of the Fujiwara clan. Served as Naishin (645-669), Naidaijin (669). This is the only time that the Naidaijin was considered superior to the other Great Ministers [中臣鎌足、藤原、内臣、内大臣]
